tap_cover_lid.description: Tap the cover lid lightly to see if it is securely closed.

press_cover_lid_to_open.description: Press the cover lid to open the trashcan.

clean_cover_lid.description: Clean the cover lid to prevent odor and maintain hygiene.

nudge_cover_lid.description: Nudge the cover lid lightly to close it.

pat_cover_lid.description: Pat the cover lid lightly to make sure it is properly fitted.

press_cover_lid.description: Press the cover lid to open it.

wipe_cover_lid.description: Wipe the cover lid to clean it.

statusCheck_cover_lid.description: The cover lid is in an unknown state, verify the status.

wipe_body_clean.description: Wipe the body of the trashcan for thorough cleaning.

polish_body_clean.description: Polish the body of the trashcan to maintain its appearance.

polish_trashcan_body.description: Polish the body of the trashcan to make its surface shinier.

wipe_trashcan_body.description: Wipe the trashcan body to clean it.

statusCheck_trashcan_body.description: The trashcan body is in an unknown state, verify the status.

routine_clean_trashcan.description: A routine task to clean the entire trashcan including the cover lid and body.

complete_trashcan_cleanup.description: A complete cleanup of the trashcan, including the cover lid and body, for deep cleaning purposes.

whole_trashcan_polish.description: Polish the whole trashcan including the cover lid and body to make its surface shinier.

clean_whole_trashcan.description: Clean the entire trashcan including the cover lid and body.

statusCheck_whole_trashcan.description: Check the status of the entire trashcan including the cover lid and body.
